about_the_game:
PHENOM is a fast-paced hybrid of simulation-style basketball and third person shooter movement with easy-to-understand controls and fluid, physics-driven mechanics. PHENOM'S over the shoulder camera puts you closer to the action, while the third person shooter driven control scheme gives you complete control over your character.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR BALLER

In PHENOM there are hundreds of customizable body part sections and color palettes. With its custom Shader System you can completely change the look and materials of your outfit.

LEVEL UP YOUR BALLER

PHENOM takes mechanics from MMO's like NBA2k and streamlines them for more accessibility. Create a custom build that is geared towards how you like to play. As you play you will earn XP and can improve your character's overall attributes.

NO PAY TO WIN IN SIGHT

PHENOMS vow is to never allow a player to be able to purchase being good at the game. You will have to work for it. There are no items cosmetic nor booster that will give you a competitive edge over another player. If you are to win it will be based on your skill and your execution.
